steps.title: People argue because they don't want to feel defeated by their "opponent."
steps.content: People argue because they don't want to feel defeated by their "opponent." If you realize that, the opponent's feeling of victory or success in each argument will fade as you continue to act like you don't care, you'll be less hesitant to stop the argument. [3] X Research source
